trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> 이벤트에 의해 발생 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> 메서드 바로 앞에 웹 파트 영역의 컨트롤을 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는 완료 되기 전에 프로세스를 취소 하는 기회를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> 이벤트는 컨트롤에 웹 파트 영역에 추가한 후에 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs> class contains information that can be used within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs> 클래스 내에서 사용할 수 있는 정보가 포함 되어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being added and the zone it is being added to.
trans-unit.target: 추가 되는 웹 파트 컨트롤 및에 추가 되는 영역에 대 한 액세스를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> (or server or user control) to be added to a Web page or opened on a page.
trans-unit.target: 웹 페이지에 추가하거나 페이지에서 열 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />(또는 서버 컨트롤이나 사용자 정의 컨트롤)입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> that <c>webPart</c> is being added to.
An integer that represents the ordinal position that <c>webPart</c> occupies in <c>zone</c>, relative to other controls in <c>zone</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>zone</c>에서 <c>zone</c>의 다른 컨트롤을 기준으로 <c>webPart</c>가 나타나는 서수 위치를 나타내는 정수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs" /> class.
Gets or sets the Web Parts zone that the Web Parts control is being added to.
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 컨트롤이 추가될 웹 파트 영역을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> that the Web Parts control is being added to.
Gets or sets the index position of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: 영역 내에서 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 컨트롤이 있는 인덱스 위치를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The numerical order of a control within its zone.
The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
trans-unit.target: 영역에 있는 첫 번째 컨트롤의 인덱스 값은 0입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> 속성에 추가 되는 웹 파트 컨트롤에 대 한 영역 내에서 순서 (또는 서 수 위치)을 나타냅니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> 컨트롤에서이 속성을 사용 하 여 추적 하 고 웹 페이지에 웹 파트 컨트롤의 컬렉션을 관리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> 컨트롤의 속성 내에서 동일한 컨트롤에 대 한 인덱스 값과 같지 않을 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> 컬렉션입니다.
